id.query: (SELECT AVG_RESP,AVAIL,PROVIDER FROM CLS_METRICS_EVENT
id.where: WHERE PROVIDER IS NOT NULL AND AVG_RESP >0)
id.outerquery: SELECT AVG(AVG_RESP) AS PERFORMANCE ,AVG(AVAIL) AS AVAILABILITY,PROVIDER FROM

id.query: SELECT DISTINCT PROVIDER AS PROVIDER_NAMES FROM CLS_TXN_EVENT
id.where: WHERE PROVIDER IS NOT NULL

id.query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS PROVIDER_CNT,SUM(TOTAL_DATA_SIZE) AS PROVIDER_DATA,PROVIDER from CLS_TXN_EVENT
id.where: WHERE PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

id.query: SELECT SUM(TOTAL_DATA_SIZE) AS DATA,PROVIDER FROM CLS_TXN_EVENT
id.where: WHERE PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

id.query: (SELECT COUNT(*) AS CONNECTOR_CNT,SUM(TOTAL_DATA_SIZE) AS CONNECTOR_DATA,CONNECTOR FROM CLS_TXN_EVENT
id.where: WHERE PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

id.query: (select SUM(TOTAL_DATA_SIZE) AS DATA,CONNECTOR from CLS_TXN_EVENT
id.where: WHERE PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

id.query: (select SUM(TOTAL_DATA_SIZE) AS CONSUMER_DATA_USAGE,COUNT(*) AS CONSUMER_CNT,CONSUMER_NAME from CLS_TXN_EVENT
id.where: WHERE PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

id.query: (select COUNT(*) AS CNT, CONSUMER_NAME from CLS_TXN_EVENT
id.where: WHERE PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

id.query: SELECT DISTINCT PROVIDER AS PROVIDER_NAMES FROM CLS_METRICS_EVENT
id.where: WHERE PROVIDER IS NOT NULL

id.query: (SELECT PROVIDER ,EVENT_CREATE_TS,AVG_RESP FROM CLS_METRICS_EVENT
id.where: WHERE AVG_RESP <> -1 AND CONNECTOR IS NOT NULL AND PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
id.outerquery: SELECT PROVIDER AS PROVIDER_PERFORMANCE,TO_CHAR(EVENT_CREATE_TS,'{MM/DD/MI/HH/MI}') AS PROVIDER_PERFORMANCE_PERIOD,AVG(AVG_RESP) AS PROVIDER_PERFORMANCE_AVG_RESP FROM

id.query: (SELECT CONSUMER_NAME,EVENT_CREATE_TS,TOTAL_TIME FROM CLS_TXN_EVENT
id.where: WHERE PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
id.outerquery: SELECT CONSUMER_NAME CONSUMER_PERFORMANCE,TO_CHAR(EVENT_CREATE_TS,'{MM/DD/MI/HH/MI}') AS CONSUMER_PERFORMANCE_PERIOD,AVG(TOTAL_TIME) AS CONSUMER_AVG_RESP FROM

id.query: (SELECT AVG(AVG_RESP) AS CONNECTOR_TOP_AVG_RESP,CONNECTOR AS TOP_CONNECTOR_AVG_RESP_TIME FROM CLS_METRICS_EVENT
id.where: WHERE AVG_RESP <> -1 AND CONNECTOR IS NOT NULL AND PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

id.query: (SELECT AVG(AVG_RESP) AS CONNECTOR_LOW_AVG_RESP,CONNECTOR AS LOW_CONNECTOR_AVG_RESP_TIME from CLS_METRICS_EVENT
id.where: WHERE AVG_RESP <> -1 AND CONNECTOR IS NOT NULL AND PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

id.query: (SELECT PROVIDER ,EVENT_CREATE_TS,AVAIL FROM CLS_METRICS_EVENT
id.where: WHERE AVG_RESP <> -1 AND CONNECTOR IS NOT NULL AND PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
id.outerquery: SELECT PROVIDER AS PROVIDER_AVAILABILITY,TO_CHAR(EVENT_CREATE_TS,'{MM/DD/MI/HH/MI}') AS PROVIDER_AVAILABILITY_PERIOD,AVG(AVAIL) AS PROVIDER_AVAILABILITY_AVAIL FROM

id.query: (select AVG(AVAIL) AS TOP_CONNECTOR_AVAIL,CONNECTOR AS TOP_CONNECTOR_AVAILABILITY FROM CLS_METRICS_EVENT
id.where: WHERE AVG_RESP <> -1 AND CONNECTOR IS NOT NULL AND PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

id.query: (select AVG(AVAIL) AS LOW_CONNECTOR_AVAIL,CONNECTOR AS LOW_CONNECTOR_AVAILABILITY from CLS_METRICS_EVENT
id.where: WHERE AVG_RESP <> -1 AND CONNECTOR IS NOT NULL AND PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

id.query: SELECT DISTINCT PROVIDER AS PROVIDER_NAMES FROM CLS_ERR_EVENT
id.where: WHERE PROVIDER IS NOT NULL

id.query: (SELECT PROVIDER ,EVENT_CREATE_TS FROM CLS_ERR_EVENT
id.where: WHERE PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
id.outerquery: SELECT PROVIDER AS PROVIDER_NAME_ERROR_TRENDS ,TO_CHAR(EVENT_CREATE_TS,'{MM/DD/MI/HH/MI}') AS PROVIDER_ERROR_PERIOD,COUNT(*) AS PROVIDER_ERRORS FROM

id.query: (SELECT CONSUMER_NAME,EVENT_CREATE_TS FROM CLS_ERR_EVENT
id.where: WHERE PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
id.outerquery: SELECT CONSUMER_NAME AS CONSUMER_NAME_ERROR_TRENDS,TO_CHAR(EVENT_CREATE_TS,'{MM/DD/MI/HH/MI}') AS CONSUMER_ERROR_PERIOD,COUNT(*) AS CONSUMER_ERRORS FROM

id.query: (SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOP_SERVICES_ERRORS,SERVICE_NAME AS TOP_SERVICE_NAME FROM CLS_ERR_EVENT
id.where: WHERE PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

id.query: (SELECT COUNT(*) AS LOW_SERVICES_ERRORS,SERVICE_NAME AS LOW_SERVICE_NAME FROM CLS_ERR_EVENT
id.where: WHERE PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

id.query: SELECT DISTINCT PROVIDER AS DISTINCT_PROVIDER FROM CLS_MON_EVENT
(SELECT * FROM CLS_MON_EVENT
id.where: WHERE ALERT_TYPE='Sla' AND PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
id.outerquery: SELECT PROVIDER AS PROVIDER_NAME_VIOLATION_TRENDS,TO_CHAR(EVENT_CREATE_TS,'{MM/DD/MI/HH/MI}') AS PROVIDER_VIOLATION_PERIOD,COUNT(*) AS PROVIDER_VIOLATION_COUNT FROM

id.query: (SELECT count(*) AS PROVIDER_SLA_COUNT,PROVIDER AS PROVIDER_NAME_SLA_VIOLATION FROM CLS_MON_EVENT
id.where: WHERE ALERT_TYPE='Sla' AND PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

id.query: (SELECT count(*) AS CONSUMER_SLA_COUNT,CONSUMER_NAME AS CONSUMER_NAME_SLA_VIOLATION FROM CLS_MON_EVENT
id.where: WHERE ALERT_TYPE='Sla' AND PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

id.query: (SELECT count(*) AS SERVICE_SLA_COUNT,service_name AS SERVICE_NAME_SLA_VIOLATION FROM CLS_MON_EVENT
id.where: WHERE ALERT_TYPE='Sla' AND PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

id.query: (SELECT COUNT(*) AS SERVICE_MON_COUNT,SERVICE_NAME AS SERVICE_NAME_MON FROM CLS_MON_EVENT
id.where: WHERE ALERT_TYPE='Monitor' AND PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

id.query: (SELECT COUNT(*) AS EVENT_SRC_MON_COUNT,EVENT_SOURCE AS EVENT_SOURCE_MON FROM CLS_MON_EVENT
id.where: WHERE ALERT_TYPE='Monitor' AND PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

id.query: (SELECT COUNT(*) AS EVENT_SRC_SLA_COUNT,EVENT_SOURCE AS EVENT_SOURCE_SLA FROM CLS_MON_EVENT
id.where: WHERE ALERT_TYPE='Sla' AND PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

id.query: SELECT DISTINCT PROVIDER AS DISTINCT_PROVIDER FROM CLS_TXN_EVENT
SELECT DISTINCT CONNECTOR AS DISTINCT_CONNECTOR FROM CLS_TXN_EVENT
id.where: WHERE PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND CONNECTOR IS NOT NULL

id.query: SELECT ceil(count(*)/50) as pages FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT T1.*,DECODE(T2.FAILURE_CNT, NULL, 0,T2.FAILURE_CNT) AS FAILURE_CNT, DECODE(T2.FAILURE_CNT, NULL, T1.TOTAL_CNT,T1.TOTAL_CNT - T2.FAILURE_CNT) AS SUCCESS_CNT FROM (SELECT PROVIDER,CONNECTOR,SERVICE_NAME, ROUND(AVG(TOTAL_DATA_SIZE), 2) AVG_DATA_SIZE,ROUND(AVG(TOTAL_TIME), 2) AVG_TIME,COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM CLS_TXN_EVENT WHERE PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND CONNECTOR = {CONNECTOR} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP GROUP BY PROVIDER,CONNECTOR,SERVICE_NAME) T1 FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT PROVIDER,CONNECTOR,SERVICE_NAME,COUNT(*) AS FAILURE_CNT FROM CLS_TXN_EVENT WHERE STATUS != 'SUCCESS' AND PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND CONNECTOR = {CONNECTOR} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP GROUP BY PROVIDER,CONNECTOR,SERVICE_NAME) T2 ON T1.PROVIDER = T2.PROVIDER AND T1.CONNECTOR = T2.CONNECTOR AND T1.SERVICE_NAME = T2.SERVICE_NAME) )

SELECT * FROM (SELECT SERVICE_VIEW.*,ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT T1.*,DECODE(T2.FAILURE_CNT, NULL, 0,T2.FAILURE_CNT) AS FAILURE_CNT, DECODE(T2.FAILURE_CNT, NULL, T1.TOTAL_CNT,T1.TOTAL_CNT - T2.FAILURE_CNT) AS SUCCESS_CNT FROM (SELECT PROVIDER,CONNECTOR, SERVICE_NAME, ROUND(AVG(TOTAL_DATA_SIZE), 2) AVG_DATA_SIZE,ROUND(AVG(TOTAL_TIME), 2) AVG_TIME,COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM CLS_TXN_EVENT WHERE PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND CONNECTOR = {CONNECTOR} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP GROUP BY PROVIDER,CONNECTOR,SERVICE_NAME) T1 FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT PROVIDER,CONNECTOR,SERVICE_NAME,COUNT(*) AS FAILURE_CNT FROM CLS_TXN_EVENT WHERE STATUS != 'SUCCESS' AND PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND CONNECTOR = {CONNECTOR} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP GROUP BY PROVIDER,CONNECTOR,SERVICE_NAME) T2 ON T1.PROVIDER = T2.PROVIDER AND T1.CONNECTOR = T2.CONNECTOR AND T1.SERVICE_NAME = T2.SERVICE_NAME) ) SERVICE_VIEW WHERE ROWNUM <= {PAGEEND}) WHERE RNUM >= {PAGESTART}
SELECT DISTINCT PROVIDER AS DISTINCT_PROVIDER FROM {EVENT_TYPE}
id.where: WHERE PROVIDER IS NOT NULL

id.query: SELECT DISTINCT CONNECTOR AS DISTINCT_CONNECTOR FROM {EVENT_TYPE}
id.where: WHERE PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND CONNECTOR IS NOT NULL

id.query: SELECT DISTINCT SERVICE_NAME AS DISTINCT_SERVICE_NAME FROM {EVENT_TYPE}
id.where: WHERE PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND CONNECTOR = {CONNECTOR} AND SERVICE_NAME IS NOT NULL

id.query: (SELECT EVENT_CREATE_TS,TARGET_NAME,SESSION_ID,SERVICE_NAME,CONNECTOR FROM {EVENT_TYPE}
id.where: WHERE PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND CONNECTOR = {CONNECTOR} AND SERVICE_NAME = {SERVICE_NAME} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )

id.query: (SELECT TARGET_NAME,PROVIDER,CONNECTOR,SERVICE_NAME,SESSION_ID, 'N/A' AS SOURCE,'N/A' AS DESCRIPTION, 'N/A' AS STATUS,TO_CHAR(EVENT_CREATE_TS,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS EVENT_CREATE_TIMESTAMP FROM {EVENT_TYPE}
id.where: WHERE PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND CONNECTOR = {CONNECTOR} AND SERVICE_NAME = {SERVICE_NAME} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

id.query: (SELECT TARGET_NAME,PROVIDER,CONNECTOR,SERVICE_NAME,SESSION_ID,ERROR_SOURCE AS SOURCE,ERROR_DESC AS DESCRIPTION,'N/A' AS STATUS,TO_CHAR(EVENT_CREATE_TS,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS EVENT_CREATE_TIMESTAMP FROM {EVENT_TYPE}
id.where: WHERE PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND CONNECTOR = {CONNECTOR} AND SERVICE_NAME = {SERVICE_NAME} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

id.query: (SELECT TARGET_NAME,PROVIDER,CONNECTOR,SERVICE_NAME,SESSION_ID,ALERT_SOURCE AS SOURCE,ALERT_DESC AS DESCRIPTION,'N/A' AS STATUS,TO_CHAR(EVENT_CREATE_TS,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS EVENT_CREATE_TIMESTAMP FROM {EVENT_TYPE}
id.where: WHERE PROVIDER = {PROVIDER} AND CONNECTOR = {CONNECTOR} AND SERVICE_NAME = {SERVICE_NAME} AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

id.query: SELECT 'N/A' AS DISTINCT_PROVIDER ,'N/A' AS DISTINCT_CONNECTOR,'N/A' AS DISTINCT_SERVICE_NAME FROM {EVENT_TYPE}
(SELECT EVENT_CREATE_TS,TARGET_NAME,'N/A' AS SESSION_ID,'N/A' AS SERVICE_NAME,'N/A' AS CONNECTOR FROM {EVENT_TYPE}
id.where: WHERE TARGET_NAME IS NOT NULL AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )

id.query: (SELECT TARGET_NAME,'N/A' AS PROVIDER,'N/A' AS CONNECTOR,'N/A' AS SERVICE_NAME,'N/A' AS SESSION_ID, 'N/A' AS SOURCE,'N/A' AS DESCRIPTION,EVENT_STATUS,TO_CHAR(EVENT_CREATE_TS,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS EVENT_CREATE_TIMESTAMP FROM {EVENT_TYPE}
id.where: WHERE TARGET_NAME IS NOT NULL AND EVENT_CREATE_TS BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - {PERIOD} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
